name: Starhawk
text: Interrupt: When Starhawk takes damage exactly equal to his remaining hit points, return him to your hand.

name: Fighting Fit
text: Hero Action (attack): Deal 2 damage to the villain (5 damage instead if your hero's remaining hit points are equal to or greater than your hero's starting hit points).

name: Dauntless
text:
Play under any player's control.
 Max 1 per player.
 While your hero's remaining hit points are equal to or greter than your hero's starting hit points, your hero gains retaliate 1.

flavor: "I will die before I yield!" - Drax
name: Hard to Ignore
text: Hero Response: After youer hero defends against an attack and takes no damage, exhaust Hard to Ignore → remote 1 threat from the main scheme.

name: Rocket Raccoon
text: Play only if your identity has the [[guardian]] trait. Interrupt: When Rocket Raccoon attacks a minion, he gets +3 ATK for that attack. That attack gains overkill.

name: Flora and Fauna
text: Team Up (Groot and Rocket Raccoon). Max 1 per deck Hero Action: Place 2 growth counters on Groot (to a maximum of 10) and ready him, or place 2 charge counters on a Rocket Raccoon upgrade and ready that upgrade.

name: Deft Focus
text: Max 1 per player. Hero Action: Exhaust Deft Focus → reduce the resource cost of the next [[superpower]] card you play this turn by 1.

flavor: "Whoopee! We're a *tik* team again! There ain't no way they can *tik* stop us now!"
name: Bug
text: Hero Response: After your hero makes a basic attack, heal 1 damage from Bug.

name: Looking for Trouble
text: Hero Action (thwart): Discard cards from the top of the encounter deck until you discard a minion. Put that minion into play engaged with you → remove 3 threat from the main scheme.

name: Follow Through
text: Hero Interrupt: When your hero's attack deals any amount of excess damage, increase that amount by 1.

name: Hand Cannon
text: Restricted. Uses (3 charge counters). Hero Interrupt: When your hero makes a basic attack, exhaust Hand Cannon and remoe 1 charge counter from it → your hero gets +2 ATK for that attack. That attack gains overkill.

name: Groot
text: Play only if your identity has the [[guardian]] trait. Response: After Groot defends against an attack, heal 2 damage from him.

name: Flora and Fauna
text: Team Up (Groot and Rocket Raccoon). Max 1 per deck Hero Action: Place 2 growth counters on Groot (to a maximum of 10) and ready him, or place 2 charge counters on a Rocket Raccoon upgrade and ready that upgrade.

name: Booster Boots
text: Play only if your identity has the [[guardian]] trait. Hero Interrupt: When you would take any amount of damage from an attack, exhaust Booster Boots and discard the top card of your deck → prevent 1 of that damage.
